alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 1:26PM PST until March 01 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Heaviest tonight. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, except up to 20 inches above 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains, Los Angeles County Mountains and Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, especially over major mountain passes including Interstate 5 over the Grapevine and Highway 33 in Ventura County. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
